ComicInfo.Summary:
The Jigsaw Corpse: El Condor returns from the grave to lead a revolution against El General.
Death Warmed Over: Prospectors Hutch and Morgan find a huge deposit of oil, then Hutch kills his partner.
Death Took the Curtain Calls: A reporter discovers a ventriloquist's secret.
Getting Rid of Robert: A mill owner shuts down the factory but the workers manage to make one more tapestry.
Every Silver Lining's Got a Cloud!: When Scott Radner gets wise to con-man Carter Sherred's scheme, Carter has him killed.
Lola Is a Lethal Lady: Lola Griswold puts an ad in the newspaper looking for a husband. Those that respond she kills and uses their various parts to create a perfect husband.
A Plague of Rats: Phineas Mott, a bum, uses music to attract local rats into town.
Tapestry of Dreams: After Madame Xanadu dismisses a mysterious visitor, she greets Stephen Prince, whose romance with Laurel has been complicated by the arrival of their new neighbor, Mr. Hazel. Madame Xanadu explains that Mr. Hazel is an incubus who creates tapestries from his victims' dreams. If these tapestries are destroyed, the incubus loses his power, but his victims also die. Stephen enters Laurel's dreams in order to defeat Mr. Hazel and release his victims.
ComicInfo.Tags: Madame Xanadu,The House of Secrets,Greenwich Village,France,Azazel,Abel
